title: Ebonmancer And Looming Death (Part 2)
body:
Ebonmancer And Looming Death (Part 2)

Woosh -!

Evan felt his heart beating like a war drum when the mana from the surroundings rushed towards his body.

A mana vortex started to form above Evan's head as a large amount of mana gathered around him.

For some reason, Evan was feeling very nervous since he didn't know what would happen once his prime core reached to C rank.

Elysia, Nekros and Eclipse watched everything with curious eyes without moving from their places.

'Will I get a second class?' thought Evan, as his prime core continued to absorb mana from the vortex.

The process lasted for around three minutes before the vortex above his head started to disappear.

The mana absorption rate of his prime core also slowed down and he felt the wall stopping his prime to reach C rank slowly breaking.

After one minute, the vortex above his head completely disappeared, and his prime core also stopped absorbing mana from the surroundings.

Boom-!
